# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please report it responsibly.

**Do NOT open a public issue.**

Instead, use one of the following methods:

1. **GitHub Security Advisories** (preferred): Use the [Security Advisories](https://github.com/kasapovicc/zekat-monitoring-system/security/advisories/new) tab to privately report the vulnerability.
2. **Email**: Send details to kasapovicc@users.noreply.github.com.

### What to Include

- A description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if any)

## Response Timeline

- **Acknowledgement**: Within 48 hours of report
- **Initial assessment**: Within 5 business days
- **Resolution target**: Dependent on severity

## Scope

This policy applies to the latest version of the `zekat-monitoring-system` repository on the `main` branch.

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
| ------- | --------- |
| latest  | Yes       |
